abstract.Abstract: This data set consists of 20000 messages taken from 20 newsgroups.

data.Source: Original Owner and Donor: Tom Mitchell School of Computer Science Carnegie Mellon University tom.mitchell '@' cmu.edu http://www.cs.cmu.edu/~tom/
data.Relevant Papers: T. Mitchell. Machine Learning, McGraw Hill, 1997. T. Joachims (1996). A probabilistic analysis of the Rocchio algorithm with TFIDF for text categorization, Computer Science Technical Report CMU-CS-96-118. Carnegie Mellon University. [Web Link]
